attributes.action: Stop Keir Starmer from Leading the UK into War – Demand Peaceful Foreign Policy
attributes.additional_details: We urge the UK Government to reject involvement in any new foreign wars. Military action must not be taken without full parliamentary debate and clear justification. We demand a foreign policy focused on peace, diplomacy, and national priorities, not conflict. The British people deserve transparency, not escalation.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to reject any involvement in new wars, ensure no military action is taken without full parliamentary debate, and prioritise peace, diplomacy, and the needs of the British people over foreign conflicts. Say no to war, choose peace.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly whether you'd like the Government to stop any involvement in future wars or have a debate before any involvement.
